setting.title: Followups
setting.columnlabels: Enquiry No,Client Name,Sales Person,Task1,Task2,Task3,Task4,Task5,Status,Contact Person,Contact No,Email Id
setting.query: SELECT *,[dbo].fn_getTask(enquiry_enquiryid,5) AS Task5,[dbo].fn_getTask(enquiry_enquiryid,4) AS Task4, [dbo].fn_getTask(enquiry_enquiryid,3) AS Task3,[dbo].fn_getTask(enquiry_enquiryid,2) AS Task2,[dbo].fn_getTask(enquiry_enquiryid,1) AS Task1, (CASE WHEN ISNULL(enquiry_clientid,0)>0 THEN (SELECT client_customername FROM tbl_client WHERE client_clientid=enquiry_clientid) ELSE (SELECT enquiry_companyname) END )AS Clientname, (CASE WHEN ISNULL(enquiry_clientid,0)>0 THEN (SELECT client_mobileno FROM tbl_client WHERE client_clientid=enquiry_clientid) ELSE (SELECT enquiry_mobileno) END )AS ContactNo, (CASE WHEN ISNULL(enquiry_clientid,0)>0 THEN (SELECT client_emailid FROM tbl_client WHERE client_clientid=enquiry_clientid) ELSE (SELECT enquiry_emailid) END )AS EmailId FROM tbl_enquiry LEFT JOIN tbl_opportunity on enquiry_enquiryid=opportunity_enquiryid LEFT JOIN tbl_product ON opportunity_productid=product_productid LEFT JOIN tbl_city ON opportunity_cityid=city_cityid LEFT JOIN tbl_client ON enquiry_clientid=client_clientid LEFT JOIN tbl_priority ON opportunity_priorityid=priority_priorityid LEFT JOIN tbl_employee ON enquiry_employeeid=employee_employeeid LEFT Join tbl_campaign ON campaign_campaignid=enquiry_campaignid left Join tbl_followups On followups_mid=enquiry_enquiryid LEFT JOIN tbl_enquirystatus ON enquirystatus_enquirystatusid=enquiry_enquirystatusid
